name: Chapter 3 - The Island 🏝️
description:
Chapter 3

The Island 🏝️

Zoe and Marley are enjoying their honeymoon. Especially Zoe had to rest a few days because of his stressful job. The crypto winter cost him a lot of energy. He quickly gets into a rage now. Marley, on the other hand, didn't get her fingers burned so much, she even made some profits. It was only because of this that the two of them were able to afford this trip together. She can already switch off and looks forward to yoga sessions and cocktails here on the beach.

Suddenly a huge bang snapped her out of her daydream.

"Did you hear that too?" asks Marley.

"I'm going to see what's going on up ahead at the pier." replied Zoe.
